description: This Python script provides an example of running an interactive command-line interface (CLI) to interact with an agent equipped with MCP tools, specifically for GitHub repository exploration. It defines an asynchronous function to run the agent with a given message and executes a sample query about the 'Agno' GitHub repository.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an agent that can perform tasks using specified tools, capable of running an interactive CLI.

classes.name: MCPTools
classes.description: Provides tools to interact with MCP server, specifically for GitHub in this context.

methods.name: run_agent
methods.description: Asynchronously runs an interactive CLI session with the agent, sending a message and streaming responses.
